item.title: Is AI Replacing Software Engineers? A Mid-Level Developer’s Perspective
item.description:
The tech world is abuzz with statements from industry leaders like Mark Zuckerberg, the CEO of Salesforce, and others suggesting AI will soon replace mid-level software engineers. But how much of this is hype, and how much is reality? Let’s break this down logically and focus on what’s actionable today.

The Bold Claims

Mark Zuckerberg: “Probably in 2025, Meta will have AI that can function as a mid-level engineer.”

Salesforce CEO: “We’re not adding any more engineers next year because AI has boosted productivity.”

item.title: Obsidian to Github page - Blog pipeline
item.description:
As developers, we thrive on automation. Yet, it’s often said that one of the best ways to advance our careers is through blog contributions. Despite this, starting a blog can feel daunting—it’s not just about writing. There’s ideation, creating templates, validation, and the publishing process itself. And let’s face it, it all takes time.

I have used the following automation blog pipeline inspired from various developers and curated this workflow.
